title: Maximum Rune Limit
body:
I am a collector, I like to obtain everything I can in a game.  So in league, I have a goal to get all the runes, including tier 1 and tier 2.  I was very excited to see the 1 IP tier 2 rune sale but while I was purchasing these runes, I eventually got an error that read: 
"An Error Has Occurred
You have attempted to purchase or already own more than the maximum amount for this item."

This was a very upsetting message to receive as now my dreams of owning all the runes has been destroyed.  I hope that one day Riot will increase the limit to allow us to own all of the runes so that the collectors among us can complete their collection.
